messages.body:
, International Hotel Consultant, wins a green card and prepares to
emigrate to Los Angeles

with the help of
, U.S. Green Card Lottery Coordinator (not)

And featuring semi-intrusive scam-o-notes which we hope do not interrupt the flow.
messages.raw:
CALIFORNIA DREAMIN'

Lewd Noogie, International Hotel Consultant, wins a green card and prepares to emigrate to Los Angeles

with the help of

Marykate Purchia, U.S. Green Card Lottery Coordinator (not)

And featuring semi-intrusive scam-o-notes which we hope do not interrupt the flow.

[Scam-o-note: folks contemplating immigration to the USA -- please be careful about paying for any 'services'. It is one thing to pay for legal advice on procedures, and there may be (legitimate) application fees for certain government services. It is another to pay for government forms and information which are free. Beware people claiming to give you an 'inside' angle. Also, that rumor about the streets being paved with gold -- it was an exaggeration. They are paved, though. Mostly.]

messages.subject: DVLOTTERY2004/2005.STATE.GOV(!!CONGRATULATION!!)
messages.body:
X-Originating-IP:  


DVLOTTERY.STATE.GOV
U.S. Department of State 
2201 C Street NW 
Washington, DC 20520 
www.dvlottery.state.gov 


Dear client, 

Congratulations, you have been selected as one of the lucky winners on our
internet screening machine,DV-2004-2006 USA national visa lottery program. It
is my pleasure to congratulate you on your success in the America DV-2004-2006
VISA LOTTERY GREENCARD which was applied and processed by our agency. Your visa
lottery winner's identity is ID-4200DV and your serial net visa passport with
us SNVPh700IU in this respect,you are directed to forward the following
requirements: 

l Your present contact address(for correspondent) 
l Your recent passport photograph :REGULAR MAIL: 
You can also send your photo(s) by regular mail. 
The photo must be between 1 ... by 1 ... and 2 by 2 inches (37-50 mm) square,
with the applicant?s, spouse's, or child's name printed on the back. Please
mail the photos to: 

Immigration Services:
PA/PL, Rm. 3206 
U.S. Department of State 
2301 C Street NW 
Washington, D.C. 20720 


Or Preferably, You Scann your passport photograph and send it via email for
faster processing. 

Clearance/acceptance fees ($349.67) Details of requirements: 

Your present contact address should be forwarded strictly to our receieving
email address for correspondent: 
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com 
Alternatvely for faster processing, A scanned copy of your passport photograph
should be send via our recieving email address. 


Clearance/acceptance fees payment ($349.67): we accept money order as the only
payment method due to some reasons from our past experiences. (credit card is
not acceptable,please.) Your western union or other means of money transfer
payment information should be forwarded as directed on payment procedures
through our new caramail satelite attached network order for security reasons
as indicated below. 
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com 

Your payment confirmation shall be sent to you as soon as clarification is done
on your payment. Providing the above requirements will assure you your visa
lottery acknowledgement card and visa lottery security code which we shall send
to your email address. 

Important notice :Please make sure you report and forward your lottery visa
code and acknowledgement card to the USA embassy in individual country for your
green card and other necessary claims. According to the united state code of
conduct and constitution Vol.176/866 :Act 690SN guiding all immigration, green
card permit agencies if non-response after 21days you receive this message your
winner's status shall reveal no interest and we would in response refer your
lottery code and acknowledgement card back to the USA government/immigration
service center. 
We shall be anticipating for your reply soon. 

FOR YOUR IMFORMATION OUR AGENCY ADVICES YOU TO CONTACT THE IMMIGRATION SERVICE
FOR YOUR REQUIRMENT PLS CONTACT THERE E-MAIL NOW FOR YOUR NOTICE: 
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com 

Thanks 
MARYKATE PURCHIA
CONGRATULATIONS !!! 
Co-ordinator. 

KELVIN POWELL
president 

note:your respond/reply is strictly recieved on our attached recieving email
network for security reasons.

e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com
messages.raw:
MARYKATE PURCHIA

From : dvlottery2004/005_state dvlottery <dvlottery2004_state@walla.com>
Sent : Saturday, September 4, 2004 3:07 AM
To : <dvlottery2004_state@walla.com>
Subject : DVLOTTERY2004/2005.STATE.GOV(!!CONGRATULATION!!)

X-Originating-IP: [192.116.87.64]
[allocated to an Israeli company which, like many European and American firms, provides satellite internet connections to West African ISPs, and has a good record of responding to spam complaints.]

DVLOTTERY.STATE.GOV
U.S. Department of State
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20520
www.dvlottery.state.gov

[dvlottery.state.gov => 69.25.31.98 => Internap Network Services, Atlanta Georgia
www.dvlottery.state.gov => we couldn't get it to come up
"state.gov", BTW, belongs to the US State Department. ]

Dear client,

Congratulations, you have been selected as one of the lucky winners on our internet screening machine,DV-2004-2006 USA national visa lottery program. It is my pleasure to congratulate you on your success in the America DV-2004-2006 VISA LOTTERY GREENCARD which was applied and processed by our agency. Your visa lottery winner's identity is ID-4200DV and your serial net visa passport with us SNVPh700IU in this respect,you are directed to forward the following requirements:

l Your present contact address(for correspondent)
l Your recent passport photograph :REGULAR MAIL:
You can also send your photo(s) by regular mail.
The photo must be between 1 ... by 1 ... and 2 by 2 inches (37-50 mm) square, with the applicant?s, spouse's, or child's name printed on the back. Please mail the photos to:

Immigration Services:
PA/PL, Rm. 3206
U.S. Department of State
2301 C Street NW
Washington, D.C. 20720

[C Street is the general mailing address of the US State Department, but guess what you don't win lotteries you don't enter and this is all so bogus... but you knew that, right?]

Or Preferably, You Scann your passport photograph and send it via email for faster processing.

Clearance/acceptance fees ($349.67) Details of requirements:

Your present contact address should be forwarded strictly to our receieving email address for correspondent:
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com
Alternatvely for faster processing, A scanned copy of your passport photograph should be send via our recieving email address.

[The State Department will not contact you through a rediffmail (free web mail) account, but you knew that, right? Also, even if the American public school system is terribly strained, civil servants still have a decent command of English spelling & grammar.]

Clearance/acceptance fees payment ($349.67): we accept money order as the only payment method due to some reasons from our past experiences. (credit card is not acceptable,please.) Your western union or other means of money transfer payment information should be forwarded as directed on payment procedures through our new caramail satelite attached network order for security reasons as indicated below.
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com

Your payment confirmation shall be sent to you as soon as clarification is done on your payment. Providing the above requirements will assure you your visa lottery acknowledgement card and visa lottery security code which we shall send to your email address.

Important notice :Please make sure you report and forward your lottery visa code and acknowledgement card to the USA embassy in individual country for your green card and other necessary claims. According to the united state code of conduct and constitution Vol.176/866 :Act 690SN guiding all immigration, green card permit agencies if non-response after 21days you receive this message your winner's status shall reveal no interest and we would in response refer your lottery code and acknowledgement card back to the USA government/immigration service center.
We shall be anticipating for your reply soon.

FOR YOUR IMFORMATION OUR AGENCY ADVICES YOU TO CONTACT THE IMMIGRATION SERVICE FOR YOUR REQUIRMENT PLS CONTACT THERE E-MAIL NOW FOR YOUR NOTICE:
e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com

Thanks
MARYKATE PURCHIA
CONGRATULATIONS !!!
Co-ordinator.

KELVIN POWELL
president

note:your respond/reply is strictly recieved on our attached recieving email network for security reasons.

e-mail: Immigrationdv2004Services@rediffmail.com

messages.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I received a notice that I am a winner in the US National Visa Lottery Program
and I was advised to write to your address for details. Any further information
you can provide will be greatly appreciated.

The notice I received spelled out several requirements (passport photograph,
contacting the US Consulate) but I'm unclear on the sequence or timing. Any
information you can provide in this regard will also be appreciated.

Once I have a green card are there any restrictions about where I have to live
in the US? I'm not restricted to living in Texas or someplace like that, am I?
I have dreamed all my life about living in Southern California!

Thank you very, very much!
Lewis D. Noogie
Novosibirsk, Latvia
messages.raw:
LEWD NOOGIE

Dear Sir or Madam,

I received a notice that I am a winner in the US National Visa Lottery Program and I was advised to write to your address for details. Any further information you can provide will be greatly appreciated.

The notice I received spelled out several requirements (passport photograph, contacting the US Consulate) but I'm unclear on the sequence or timing. Any information you can provide in this regard will also be appreciated.

Once I have a green card are there any restrictions about where I have to live in the US? I'm not restricted to living in Texas or someplace like that, am I? I have dreamed all my life about living in Southern California!

Thank you very, very much!
Lewis D. Noogie
Novosibirsk, Latvia

messages.subject: DVLOTTERY2004/2005.STATE.GOV(ENLIGHTMENT AND ASSURANCE )
messages.body:
TEL:1-801-447-8722 
FAX: 1-801-504-8804 
www.dvlottery.state.gov 

Dear Lewis, 

For your enlightment as regard the aim of immigration agency globally, We are
not award winner's grant agency which might be irrelevant as regard this issue
. 

This is an independent government approved agency in the USA which has
undergone true test of period over eight years in the issual and processing of
Green Cards through the United State Immigration Service under the US
Decree/Vol33/Const. 


For your Information , Your payment involvement for the accomplishment of your
Green Card Status isUnconsiderably comparingto your opprtunity/beneficiary to
work, live and become a residential holder in the USA. 

Your other benefits such as immidiate employment/job opportunity is worthwhile
to rather expecting our involvement in your personal expenses as regard 
clearance/acceptance fees, lodging suit and others which already are arranged
at a subsidised an affordable rate. 

For your feed back on the following issues: 

1) We are only United State government approved immigration agency and not
workers ,sub-body, and even an affiliation to the United state embassy. 
This is an independent govt. approved and licensed agency unedr the USA
government . 
In this respect , DVLOTTERY is an equal approved body just as the USA embassy
in your home country as refered both rendering an immigration service but of
govt/private different establishment but equal rights and services as regard
the issual of green card and other immigration requirements. 

Having been enlighten as possible you can only make your incompulsory
clearnce/acceptance fees payment of ($349.67) through our agency and not the
embassy. 

2) The United State Of America who have established this program Over years
have make all necessary provisions as regard your burden. You are automatically
entittled to some amenities as soon you arrive in the USA which has been
proclaimed on your Green Card right as a citizen. 

3) Your travelling cost incompare to your winner"s Status which over million of
people globally are willing to process will be at your expenses which have been
provided at a cheaper/subsidised rate by our agency. 

4) Kindly, find out more about lottery program from the USA embassy in your
country and i hope you will understand that immigration service agencies also
have all the reserve right and permit on the issual of Green Cards and other
immigration services. 
For your information you are very free to decline your green card status with
our agency , it is not a compulsory opprtunity to be granted. 

I will only asure you of your dream to work live and make alively hood in the
USA. 
We are legally based in the USA and not as thought , Your payments on the
accomplishent of this processing is not worth the task uphold on us to serve
you best. 

Kindly, follow our instructions and yield accordingly as directed and don't be
too inquisitive and interogating as we might not welcome such gesture. 

I hope we have make every possibities to enlighten you on this program. 

Thanks. 
Marykate Purchia.

Your other benefits such as immidiate employment/job opportunity is worthwhile to rather expecting our involvement in your personal expenses as regard clearance/acceptance fees, lodging suit and others which already are arranged at a subsidised an affordable rate.

For your feed back on the following issues:

In this respect , DVLOTTERY is an equal approved body just as the USA embassy in your home country as refered both rendering an immigration service but of govt/private different establishment but equal rights and services as regard the issual of green card and other immigration requirements.

Having been enlighten as possible you can only make your incompulsory clearnce/acceptance fees payment of ($349.67) through our agency and not the embassy.

2) The United State Of America who have established this program Over years have make all necessary provisions as regard your burden. You are automatically entittled to some amenities as soon you arrive in the USA which has been proclaimed on your Green Card right as a citizen.

3) Your travelling cost incompare to your winner"s Status which over million of people globally are willing to process will be at your expenses which have been provided at a cheaper/subsidised rate by our agency.

4) Kindly, find out more about lottery program from the USA embassy in your country and i hope you will understand that immigration service agencies also have all the reserve right and permit on the issual of Green Cards and other immigration services.
For your information you are very free to decline your green card status with our agency , it is not a compulsory opprtunity to be granted.

I will only asure you of your dream to work live and make alively hood in the USA.
We are legally based in the USA and not as thought , Your payments on the accomplishent of this processing is not worth the task uphold on us to serve you best.

Kindly, follow our instructions and yield accordingly as directed and don't be too inquisitive and interogating as we might not welcome such gesture.

I hope we have make every possibities to enlighten you on this program.

Marykate Purchia.

I am mailing you in response to my previous reply. Your requirements for
immediate processing of your green card and other visa particulars are stated

your processing record. 

1) Your present home/contact postal address where all your visa lottery
particulars shall be sent. 
2) A scanned copy of your recent passport photograph should be sent through our
email address as provided. 
3) Your clearence/acceptance fees ($349.67)is only accepted through western
union money transfer which payment information shall be made through our
finance center on the following information for immediate claim of your payment
by our agency.

ZIP CODE /CITY/STATE :.. 13815/NORWICH/NEW YORK 
COUNTRY: .........UNITED STATE

Kindly ensure that your western Union payment information are sent to our
agency(email) as soon as possible so as to enable us accomplish the processing
in due time for your take off procedure as scheduled on our record. 

Thanks . 
Marykate Purchia.

messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

I have been unable to sleep since I received your first email! You have
presented me with an opportunity to escape from this frozen wasteland to the
sunny cultural center of the universe, Los Angeles! 

Just to bring you up to date, as I have no means of scanning my passport
photograph, I have gone ahead and mailed it to the US Department of State
address that you provided in your first email.

Secondly, there is no Western Union here in Novosibirsk. This is a small town
of only a few thousand people and such facilities are not yet available here.
Is there not some other form of payment that is acceptable? Is this something
that could be handled upon my arrival in the US?

I did not understand your statement in a previous email where you said I
"...should not be too inquisitive or interogating as you might not welcome such
a gesture". I'm sure that I will have questions as this proceeds; am I not
allowed to ask them? It has been my experience that agencies associated with
the US Government are only too happy to answer any questions, offer advice,
etc.

Lewis D. Noogie
messages.raw:
LEWD NOOGIE

Ms. Purchia,

I have been unable to sleep since I received your first email! You have presented me with an opportunity to escape from this frozen wasteland to the sunny cultural center of the universe, Los Angeles!

Just to bring you up to date, as I have no means of scanning my passport photograph, I have gone ahead and mailed it to the US Department of State address that you provided in your first email.

Secondly, there is no Western Union here in Novosibirsk. This is a small town of only a few thousand people and such facilities are not yet available here. Is there not some other form of payment that is acceptable? Is this something that could be handled upon my arrival in the US?

I did not understand your statement in a previous email where you said I "...should not be too inquisitive or interogating as you might not welcome such a gesture". I'm sure that I will have questions as this proceeds; am I not allowed to ask them? It has been my experience that agencies associated with the US Government are only too happy to answer any questions, offer advice, etc.

Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

Just let me say again that I sincerely appreciate the help you are giving me to
realize a dream I've had all my life - the chance to live and work in
California! The fact that I'm going to be a RESIDENTIAL HOLDER fills me with
happiness! When I arrive there in the US of A, you and I are gonna party!

However, I'm not sure I understood your last email. To the best of my knowledge
I have complied with all requirements. What do we have to do now?

Sincerely,
Lewis

Ms. Purchia,

Just let me say again that I sincerely appreciate the help you are giving me to realize a dream I've had all my life - the chance to live and work in California! messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

I get the distinct feeling that you or someone else back there is not reading
my correspondence.

Once again, let me give you a status of the items you list:

1. Home/Postal Address - I sent this to the US State Department address that
you provided in your first email.

2. Passport Photograph - Also sent to the State Department Address provided.

3. Clearance/Acceptance Fee - We had earlier agreed that this could be paid
upon my arrival in the US.

I think everything is in order so far. Now I need to know what further steps to
take. Please let me know as soon as possible so that I can begin making travel
arrangements.

Thank you.
Lewis D. Noogie
messages.raw:
LEWD NOOGIE

1)For your information the agency is in need of all your requirement which is

Green Card Status is Unconsiderably comparing to your opprtunity/beneficiary to
work, live and become a residential holder in the USA.
 
3)Kindly, find out more about lottery program from the USA embassy in your
country and i hope you will understand that immigration service agencies also
have all the reserve right and permit on the issual of Green Cards and other
immigration services.
messages.raw:
MARYKATE PURCHIA

Sent : Tuesday, September 14, 2004 10:37 AM
Subject : URGENT.........RESPOND (REQUIREMENTS NOTIFICATION!!)

DEAR Lewis,

1)For your information the agency is in need of all your requirement which is very important to process ,any failure to supply informations needed by the state office to process your visa would lead to the declination of your visa winning status

2)For your Information , Your payment involvement for theaccomplishment of your Green Card Status is Unconsiderably comparing to your opprtunity/beneficiary to work, live and become a residential holder in the USA.

3)Kindly, find out more about lottery program from the USA embassy in your country and i hope you will understand that immigration service agencies also have all the reserve right and permit on the issual of Green Cards and other immigration services.

Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

You're either new to this business, or you're a New Yorker, or you have my case
confused with someone else's.

You told me in your first letter that I should send my passport photo and
current address to the US State Department address which you provided. I have
done so, and yet you keep asking me for it again. I also explained to you that
I have no way of scanning anything here. Now why don't you tell someone to hoof
over to the State Department and see if it has arrived yet. Please don't make
me do ALL the thinking here.

We explicitely agreed that since there is no Western Union here in Novosibirsk
that I could pay the fee upon my arrival in the US, yet you keep asking for
payment by Western Union. What part of, "there is no Western Union here in
Novosibirsk" don't you understand?

This process is going nowhere and primarily because I have to keep repeating
myself. You or someone there at your agency is either not reading my email or
does not comprehend the English language. I will be glad to provide tutoring
upon my arrival there, at a very reasonable fee.

What I need to know now is when I can plan my departure for the US. I have been
doing some research about California and I'm ready to go. Last month's playmate
is from California and I want to buy the house next to her's.

Thank you.
Lewis D. Noogie
messages.raw:
LEWD NOOGIE

Ms. Purchia,

You're either new to this business, or you're a New Yorker, or you have my case confused with someone else's.

You told me in your first letter that I should send my passport photo and current address to the US State Department address which you provided. I have done so, and yet you keep asking me for it again. I also explained to you that I have no way of scanning anything here. Now why don't you tell someone to hoof over to the State Department and see if it has arrived yet. Please don't make me do ALL the thinking here.

We explicitely agreed that since there is no Western Union here in Novosibirsk that I could pay the fee upon my arrival in the US, yet you keep asking for payment by Western Union. What part of, "there is no Western Union here in Novosibirsk" don't you understand?

This process is going nowhere and primarily because I have to keep repeating myself. You or someone there at your agency is either not reading my email or does not comprehend the English language. I will be glad to provide tutoring upon my arrival there, at a very reasonable fee.

What I need to know now is when I can plan my departure for the US. I have been doing some research about California and I'm ready to go. Last month's playmate is from California and I want to buy the house next to her's.

Thank you.
Lewis D. Noogie

YOU , WE ARE LEGALLY PRIVATE GOVERNMENT(USA)APPROVED IMMIGRATION SERVICEAND ALL

MARYKATE PURCHIA.

messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

This is exasperating, but I think I have a solution. I have a friend who lives
in New York whom I think I can convince to take care of this payment for me. If
you would send me your office address, I'll have him come and pay this fee in
person.

Please send as soon as possible as I have have been further researching living
in California and I am extremely anxious to get there. Have you ever been
there? I read a very informative cultural article entitled, "The Girls of Zuma
Beach" and I have been beside myself ever since. We really must expedite this
process!

Please send your office address as soon as possible.

Gettin' ready for that SoCal lifestyle.
Lewis D. Noogie

[]

I read a very informative cultural article entitled, "The Girls of Zuma Beach" and I have been beside myself ever since. We really must expedite this process!

[Marykate sends me a letter, but it's to a different name and the modalities are obviously in an earlier stage than my own. I forwarded it on to my good friend Joseph Stalin to see if he's interested in emigrating...]

messages.body:
Ms. Purchia,

I was expecting to hear from you yesterday. The closer I get to receiving my
green card, the more excited I get. I can't express my thanks enough for
helping me to realize my dream of living in California, but can we please hurry
this up a little bit?

It's been a considerable length of time since I heard from you. I wrote a
letter to Pamela Anderson telling her I was moving there, but I haven't heard
back from her either. Has there been some sort of breakdown in trans-Atlantic
communications that I'm unaware of?

I await your response.
Lewis D. Noogie
messages.raw:
LEWD NOOGIE

Ms. Purchia,

I was expecting to hear from you yesterday. The closer I get to receiving my green card, the more excited I get. I can't express my thanks enough for helping me to realize my dream of living in California, but can we please hurry this up a little bit?

It's been a considerable length of time since I heard from you. I wrote a letter to Pamela Anderson telling her I was moving there, but I haven't heard back from her either. Has there been some sort of breakdown in trans-Atlantic communications that I'm unaware of?

I await your response.
Lewis D. Noogie

[It would appear that Marykate's endurance has flagged; I have heard no more...]
